overview: At Private, we are firm believers that young girls can’t spend the summer just lazing around, and so we decided to open a summer school with all sorts activities. We have everything in place, including trainers, wardens and gardeners, all fully equipped to instruct Ally, Amirah Adara, Anita Bellini, Christen Courtney, Lindsey Olsen, Taissia Shanti and Tricia Teen. This select group of college girls are more than happy to spend their summer sucking dicks and getting their pussies eaten, and while they’re at it, why not some anal, DPs, and facials?? If you’re a bit of a slut and want to study some steamy summer sex, then the doors of the Private Summer School will always be open to you!
title: Private Summer School
